P

Player - Class in game
The Player entity is used both for the player as well as enemy teams you fight against.
Player(String, int) - Constructor for class game.Player
Constructor with empty team and inventory.
Player(String, int, ArrayList<Monster>, ArrayList<Item>) - Constructor for class game.Player
The constructor takes a name, initial gold amount, initial team and inventory.
PoisonMonster - Class in game.monsters
A special type of Monster with a poison attack.
PoisonMonster(String, int) - Constructor for class game.monsters.PoisonMonster
Calls base Monster constructor and adds attack string for poison attack.
postBattle() - Method in class game.Player
Gets rid of any left over status effects on any of the monsters in the team post battle.
postDayLogic() - Method in class game.GameEnvironment
Carries out all events after each day ends, checking for level ups for each monster in the player's team, and checking for the random events of monsters leaving or joining the player's team.
postPlayerTurn() - Method in class GUI.BattleScreen
 
preBattle() - Method in class game.Player
Initializes each monster to not active during battle before the battle starts, so those which are active are rewarded apporopriately post battle.
preDayLogic() - Method in class game.GameEnvironment
Takes a new day value and updates the day, refreshes the player team, refreshes the stock of the shop, and updates the battles.
preTurnLogic() - Method in class game.monsters.FlyingMonster
Carries out base class pre turn logic, and then set's isFlying to false, so flying only last's through one enemy attack.
preTurnLogic() - Method in class game.monsters.Monster
Carries out necersary logic to perform before a turn, such as dealing persistent damage, and removing damage buffs and persitent damage attacks that have run out of duration.
preTurnLogic() - Method in class game.Player
Runs preTurnLogic() for each monster in the team, and returns all the messages from the calls.
Purchaseable - Interface in game
The purchaseable interface shared by Monster and Item.
